pack.imm.hover_event: Click here to open the Immunology Wiki
commands.imm.wrong_version: You are using Immunology on the incorrect Minecraft version. You should be using Minecraft 1.20.4.
chat.imm.wiki.hover_event: Click here to open the Immunology Wiki
chat.imm.gamerules.title: Immunology Gamerules
chat.imm.gamerules.dosyphonsickness.desc: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of Syphon Sickness
chat.imm.gamerules.dotransmogrism.descri: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of Transmogrism
chat.imm.gamerules.dozombification.descr: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of Zombification
chat.imm.gamerules.doblight.description: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of Blight
chat.imm.gamerules.domar.description: Toggle whether to allow for the spread of Mar
death.disease.imm.transmogrify: %1$ transformed their insides into their outsides
advancements.imm.immunology.root.title: Immunology
advancements.imm.immunology.wear_plague_: Obtain and equip a Plague Mask
advancements.imm.immunology.obtain_fleam: Obtain a Fleam, used to cure ailments
Use a Fleam to cure another players illness
advancements.imm.immunology.be_cured.des: Be cured of an illness by another player
advancements.imm.immunology.cure_mob_of_: Cure a Villager or Piglin of Blight
advancements.imm.immunology.vomit_syphon: I Brought You Into This World
advancements.imm.immunology.kill_owned_s: I Will Take You Out Of It
Kill a Syphon you had just vomited
advancements.imm.immunology.place_syphon: Use a Syphon Spore to place a Basidia
advancements.imm.immunology.blight_sneez: Sneeze for the first time after contracting Blight
Cure yourself of Blight by consuming a Suspicious Stew
advancements.imm.immunology.drink_milk_w: Drink a Milk Bucket while infected with Blight
advancements.imm.immunology.cure_mar.des: Cure yourself of Mar by using a Decorated Pot
advancements.imm.immunology.spirits_hurt: Inadvertently allow your haunters to attack something
advancements.imm.immunology.shatter_tool: Shatter a tool while infected with Mar
advancements.imm.immunology.obtain_ectop: Obtain a piece of Ectoplasm to save your tools
advancements.imm.immunology.contract_zom: Be attacked by a foul Zombie
advancements.imm.immunology.consume_all_: Eat every food you can while Zombifying
advancements.imm.immunology.vomit_food.d: Attempt to eat the same food twice while Zombifying
advancements.imm.immunology.agro_iron_go: Get too close to an Iron Golem while Zombifying
